home.contactText: Have questions or need more information? Don't hesitate to contact us!
home.conandDescription: CONAND (Conference Andorra) is Andorra's tech conference, organized by the community, for the community. We bring together professionals, students and tech enthusiasts through meetups, workshops and an annual conference to share knowledge, build connections and boost the local tech ecosystem.
home.gdgDescription: CONAND is the official Google Developer Group (GDG) of Andorra. GDGs are local developer communities that meet to learn, share and grow together with Google technologies and beyond. Join our community!

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Our moments
gallery.description: Relive the best moments from our events: conferences, meetups, workshops and networking. Each image captures the essence of Andorra's tech community.
